mapper.select: select w.wnum wnum, w.wgubun wgubun, w.wloc1 wloc1, w.wloc2 wloc2, w.wtitle wtitle, w.wcontents wcontents, TO_CHAR(w.wchgdate, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') wchgdate, w.whit whit, w.wrec wrec, s.aid aid, substr(s.aid,1,4) paid from signup s, community_board w where s.anum = w.anum and wnum=#{wnum}
mapper.update: update community_board set whit = whit+1 where wnum = #{wnum}
update community_board set wrec = wrec+1 where wnum = #{wnum}
update community_board set wgubun = #{wgubun}, wtitle = #{wtitle}, wcontents = #{wcontents}, wloc1 = #{wloc1}, wloc2 = #{wloc2}, wchgdate = sysdate where wnum = #{wnum}
update community_board set wdel = 1 where wnum = #{wnum}
